alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:17PM CDT until August 07 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT/845 PM CDT/ FOR WALLACE AND WESTERN LOGAN COUNTIES... At 716 PM MDT/816 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Wallace, or 14 miles east of Sharon Springs, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball size hail in Wallace at 7:00pm MT. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sharon Springs, Weskan and Wallace. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
